text:
@PressSec Not a word of sorrow for the beautiful 11-year-old Miami boy who died of coronavirus?

Or the sweet 8-year-old girl in North Carolina who died of covid?

Or the 5-year-old daughter of first responders in Detroit?

Or the 1-year-old toddler in New Jersey?

https://t.co/rXadOvkAod
